import { useContext } from 'react' import { Context } from '../context' function CounterButton() { const { count, setCount, setAddToBasket } = useContext(Context) const inc = () => setCount(count + 1) const dec = () => { count > 0 ? setCount(count - 1) : setCount(0) } return (
{count}

setAddToBasket(true)}> Add to cart

) } export { CounterButton }
